ResearchProjectDef.label: industrial circuit breaker
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows building industrial-sized circuit breakers capable of protecting you from a powerful electric discharge.

ResearchProjectDef.label: glitterworld city circuit breaker
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows building glitterworld city circuit breakers capable of protecting you from an insane electric discharge, thanks to a built in AI system. Requires an AI Core to be constructed.
